      • addAdministratorAccount

        public boolean addAdministratorAccount(java.lang.String username,
                                       java.lang.String password,
                                       java.lang.String names,
                                       java.lang.String surnames)
                                throws CantAddAccountException
        This method adds an administrator account to the accountList.
        Pre: The methods addAccount and searchAccount have been called.
        Post: An administrator account has been added to the list.
        Parameters:
        username - It is the username used in the account.
        password - It is the password of the account.
        names - It is the name(s) of the administrator.
        surnames - It is the surname(s) of the administrator.
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean indicating if the account was added.
        Throws:
        CantAddAccountException

      • addRequest

        public long addRequest(java.lang.String name,
                       Category category,
                       java.lang.String brand,
                       int price,
                       int stock,
                       java.lang.String description,
                       Seller seller,
                       RequestType requestType)
        This method adds a request to the general requestList.
        Pre: The methods randomNumberWithRange and sortRequestsByInsertion have been called.
        Post: A request has been added to the list.
        Parameters:
        name - It is the name of the product.
        category - It is the category of the product.
        brand - It is the brand of the product.
        price - It is the price of the product.
        stock - It is the number of products available.
        description - It is the description of the product.
        seller - It is the seller that did the request.
        requestType - It is the type of request that the seller could do. It could be ADD, EDIT, DISABLE, ENABLE, DELETE a product.
        Returns:
        Returns a long with the ID.

      • delete

        public void delete(PaymentMethod paymentMethod)
        This method deletes a payment method.
        At first it checks if 'paymentMethod.getLeft() == null && paymentMethod.getRight())' is null. If that's the case, it checks if it is not instantiated.
        If it is not null, this method is called by itself with 'currentPayment.getLeft()' and 'newPayment' as parameters.
        Pre: The methods deletePaymentMethod and getMin have been called.
        Post: A payment method has been removed.
        Parameters:
        paymentMethod - It is the payment method.

      • getMin

        public PaymentMethod getMin(PaymentMethod current)
        This method gets a payment method.
        At first it checks if 'current.getRight()' != null. While that's the case, current = current.getRight();.
        Pre: The method getRight has been called.
        Parameters:
        current - It is the current payment method.
        Returns:
        current.
